items.title: ‘They haven’t finished writing it’: Marvel star offers incredibly worrying update on ‘Avengers: Doomsday’
items.excerpt: Recent MCU instalments have given us the impression that Marvel Studios has finally learned its lesson when it comes to how it approaches its major project but a concerning update from an actor involved in suggests the studio is slipping back into bad habits already.

items.title: ‘Fantastic Four’ star Ebon Moss-Bachrach revealed what he’d do he if had superpowers, and MAGA is furious
